entry.title: Artists Could Use a Poison Pill to Combat AI Exploitation
entry.summary: Researchers hope Nightshade will serve as an example of "data poisoning" that can prevent unauthorized ingestion of artists' works.

entry.title: While Meta Pushes Into AI, 34 States File Suit Over Child Manipulation Claims
entry.summary: Despite Meta’s claims of a safe environment, states argue that Facebook and Instagram pose risks to the mental health of kids.

entry.title: Habitat is Meta's Vision for the Future of Human-Robot Cohabitation
entry.summary: From following you around to helping you tidy up your room, Meta's latest AI advancements promise a future where robots are more than just tools.

entry.title: Adult Entertainment Actors Say Their Defenses Against AI Are More Elusive
entry.summary: Like SAG-AFTRA, Adult film performers seek protection from unauthorized AI deepfake porn and compensation for their work.

entry.title: Binance Execs Are Deserting The Company–Here’s Who They Are
entry.summary: Although the reasons varied, sixteen executives have left the company over the past few years.

entry.title: U.S. Senators Set in Motion Bipartisan Proof-of-Reserves Bill
entry.summary: Crypto advocates across the spectrum applaud the legislative action.

entry.title: Coinbase Submits Final Argument to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit
entry.summary: Legal loggerheads have persisted between the SEC and Coinbase since June.

entry.title: SEC Fines BlackRock $2.5 Million as Bitcoin ETF Review Awaits
entry.summary: It’s not the first time the Wall Street giant has been fined by the SEC.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds Gain $57 Million in Fresh Cash Amid ETF Mania
entry.summary: Most deposits went to spot Bitcoin ETFs in Canada and Germany, showing that investors want physical Bitcoin over anything else, said Coinshares.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ally Tom Emmer Drops Out of Race for House Speaker After Trump Attack
entry.summary: The ardently pro-crypto congressman was one vote away from the gavel, but the former president torpedoed his chances.

entry.title: Crypto Lender BlockFi Ends Bankruptcy With a Plan to Repay Customers
entry.summary: BlockFi custodial wallet customers can submit withdrawal requests today, but interest bearing account customers will have to wait until 2024.

entry.title: Maison Margiela Invites Its Fans To Play Blockchain Bingo
entry.summary: To advance in the numerological project, minters have got to collect them all.

entry.title: Bitcoin Wobbles as BlackRock ETF Removed From DTCC List
entry.summary: The removal puts a damper on suspicions that a spot Bitcoin ETF was only days away.

entry.title: Can a FanDuel Co-Founder's 'Fantasy Music' Game Help Discover the Next Taylor Swift?
entry.summary: Vault’s Solana NFT music platform is spinning up a fantasy sports-like experience around emerging artists. Can it push them to prominence?

entry.title: Hacker Denis Katana Helped Russian Crime Boss Launder Money With Bitcoin, Says Spanish Judge
entry.summary: The 'Bitcoin czar' is accused of advising a crime ring to launder their money with Bitcoin because of its “lack of state control.”

entry.title: dYdX Releases Cosmos-Based Chain Source Code Ahead of Mainnet Launch
entry.summary: The release of the open source code marks the initial phase of dYdX Chain’s mainnet launch.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Soar Double Digits as Crypto Markets Add $100 Billion
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum soared nearly double digits early on Tuesday, as the wider crypto market added nearly 10% to its market cap overnight.

entry.title: Andreessen Horowitz Backs Nym's $300M Privacy-Centric 'Innovation Fund'
entry.summary: Applications for the innovation fund, which is not strictly limited to Nym’s privacy-preserving tech, will be accepted starting in November.

entry.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Sells $5.8M in Coinbase, Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Shares as Crypto Market Surges
entry.summary: As Bitcoin jumped over 10% amid renewed hopes of a spot ETF approval, Ark Invest opted to sell some of its Bitcoin-related assets.

entry.title: Deepfakes Made Simple With AI: An In-Depth Look at FaceFusion
entry.summary: The open-source FaceFusion tool is described as a next-generation face swapper and enhancer, and an accessible entry into the world of deepfake creation.

entry.title: Next Snapdragon Chip Leaks: The Upcoming Mobile CPU Is Packed with AI Power
entry.summary: From enhanced performance to groundbreaking AI capabilities, the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 is set to redefine what you can do with your smartphone.

entry.title: Bitcoin Touches $34K as $114 Million in Shorts Liquidated
entry.summary: A second rally for the day triggered $145 million in overall crypto market liquidations.

entry.title: Film3 Summit Returns to L.A. Alongside Streaming Festival With Theta
entry.summary: The live Film3 Summit will run alongside MetaFilm3 Fest, an on-chain festival powered by Theta that includes multiple film premieres.

entry.title: Ghost in the Machine: OpenAI CEO Sees ChatGPT on Track From AI to AGI
entry.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman delved into the transformative potential of AI, hinting at a future where data takes a backseat to reasoning.

entry.title: What Are the Odds Sam Bankman-Fried Testifies in His Trial?
entry.summary: The formal crypto mogul has remained silent in court so far. But that could change as his trial progresses.

entry.title: SEC Ordered to Review Grayscale’s Bitcoin ETF Application
entry.summary: Will the SEC find another reason to reject Grayscale, or will it finally approve a spot Bitcoin ETF?

entry.title: These Crypto Stocks Are Still Outperforming Bitcoin
entry.summary: While Bitcoin has been a great buy, many companies built around it are flying even higher this year.

entry.title: BlackRock Preps for Bitcoin ETF Launch, Lines Up Seed Investor and Reveals Ticker
entry.summary: BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust has a ticker and seed funding lined up.

entry.title: Bitcoin Blasts Past $31,000 as Optimism for BTC Spot ETF Surges
entry.summary: The last time the asset was this high was back in July.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Coming Soon? Delays Have SEC’s Hester Peirce ‘Mystified’
entry.summary: After Grayscale's court victory, Hester Peirce doesn't know what her agency is waiting for.

entry.title: Microstrategy’s Bitcoin Billions Back in Profit as ‘Digital Gold’ Nears $31K
entry.summary: BTC is fast closing in on $31,000 per coin—which means the largest public owner of the asset is making a return on its investment.

entry.title: What is the Lightning Network? Bitcoin's Scalability Solution.
entry.summary: Lightning Network is a scaling solution that attempts to address Bitcoin's slow transaction speeds and high transaction costs.

entry.title: US Banking Crisis Destroyed Institutional Crypto Trading: Chainalysis
entry.summary: Crypto activity saw a sharp drop following Silicon Valley Bank and crypto-friendly banks Signature and Silvergate shutting down.

entry.title: Almost All Mining Stocks Have Outpaced Bitcoin This Year
entry.summary: Most mining stocks, except two, have outperformed Bitcoin by more than double this year despite the ongoing bear market.

entry.title: Web3 Security Firm Blockaid Lands $33 Million in Latest Funding
entry.summary: By offering an enhanced level of security for Web3 wallets, Blockaid aims to make the space safer for average users.

entry.title: Bitcoin Sees Lion’s Share of Investment Amid Spot ETF Hype: CoinShares
entry.summary: As hype around a spot Bitcoin ETF reaches a pitch, investors are looking for more exposure to the leading cryptocurrency, reports CoinShares.

entry.title: Chainlink Leads Crypto Market Rally, Soaring 8% Overnight
entry.summary: The price of Chainlink’s LINK rose about $10, bringing the oracle token to a high not seen in the last 17 months.

entry.title: Robot Hands Can Match Humans' Dexterity With New AI Smarts, Claims Nvidia
entry.summary: Nvidia is all-in when it comes to AI. Eureka helps robots learn intricate skills faster than an aspiring surgeon, and its new SteerLM wants to make human annotation in AI training a thing of the past.

entry.title: Midnight Society's Rob Bowling on Deadrop's New Cars and User-Generated Modes
entry.summary: Decrypt reporter and GG producer Kate Irwin interviews Midnight Society Studio Head Rob Bowling about Deadrop's development and Snapshot VII.

entry.title: Game Review: 'Raini: The Lords of Light' Brands Itself With Memes
entry.summary: Raini: Lords of Light is an NFT-optional card game bursting with crypto memes. From SBF to CZ and Elon, this free-to-play game has some truly wild animations. Decrypt contributor Ryan S. Gladwin shares his honest thoughts on the game.

entry.title: Art Blocks Marfa Weekend Recap
entry.summary: Relive the Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023 event with this highlights video, produced by Vincent Roazzi Jr. for Decrypt Studios in partnership with Art Blocks.

entry.title: Phantom Galaxies: A Look Inside the Mech Shooter NFT Game
entry.summary: Animoca Brands and game studio Blowfish are developing Phantom Galaxies, an upcoming sci-fi mech shooter game inspired by mech battlers like Transformers. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks Blowfish Studios Cofounder and Managing Director Ben Lee about what it's like to play the game.

entry.title: Clip: DeepMedia's DeepID Deepfake Detection Tool at Work
entry.summary: A clip showcasing how DeepMedia's DeepID deepfake detection tool works. Courtesy: DeepMedia

entry.title: Decentraland AI World Fair Trailer
entry.summary: A trailer for the AI World Fair event in metaverse game Decentraland, taking place from October 25-27. Courtesy: Decentraland.

entry.title: BackTheBunny - Money, Conspiracy, Milady
entry.summary:
Our host Reza Jafery sits down with BackTheBunny to dive deep into money, the fight against crypto that we're witnessing in real-time, and milady culture.
Our Host: https://twitter.com/rezajafery Our Guest: https://twitter.com/BackTheBunny
Our Sponsors https://decrypt.co/1000x

entry.title: 'A Grand Experiment': Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury Talks Game Economics
entry.summary: How much of Shrapnel's in-game items are tradeable NFTs? Don Norbury, Studio Head at Shrapnel and CTO at game studio NEON, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about Shrapnel's approach to game economics, including different game pricing models and how NFT game economies create different challenges for developers.

entry.title: Trezor Safe 3 and Trezor Keep Metal Unboxing
entry.summary: Trezor has launched the Safe 3, a hardware wallet aimed at "new entrants to crypto," alongside the new Keep Metal recovery seed storage device. We take a first look at what comes in the box.

entry.title: Why AI Arena is Building on Arbitrum
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss the challenges that come with building on Ethereum, ETH sidechains, and layer-two blockchains.

entry.title: Pet3rPan_ on venture DAOs and blockchain games
entry.summary:
Welcome to the 4th episode of this time will be different.
Our guest for today's episode is Pet3rpan_ from Metacartel, 1kx, HydraVentures, and more!
https://twitter.com/pet3rpan_
This Time Will Be Different is sponsored by 1000x https://decrypt.co/1000x

entry.title: Inside Shrapnel's Marketplace, New Map, and 'AI Director' Feature
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Shrapnel's Head of Studio Don Norbury to get the latest updates on how the NFT-powered first-person sci-fi extraction shooter's development is progressing.

entry.title: 'Art of the Times': Art Blocks Founder Erick Calderon on the State of Generative Art
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO Erick Calderon sat down with Sander Lutz, lead culture reporter at Decrypt's SCENE, at Art Blocks Marfa Weekend 2023. They discuss the evolution of the company and the generative art world, along with what draws art enthusiasts to be an active part of the community.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: Digital Ownership Explained
entry.summary: One of the most powerful aspects of blockchain technology is its ability to provide us genuine ownership of our digital assets. This is called digital ownership. In this video, we’ll deep dive into digital ownership, why it matters, and how web3 makes owning digital assets like our social networks, music libraries, personal data, and beyond possible. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Writer at Consensys.

entry.title: Martin Shkreli on E/ACC and SBF in Prison
entry.summary: Reza Jafery and Martin Shkreli sit down for a casual conversation about the growing movement that is E/ACC, what songs they could recite at gunpoint, and whether or not SBF will thrive or just survive during his time in prison.

entry.title: What Can AI Do in Gaming?
entry.summary: AI Arena CEO Brandon Da Silva and COO Wei Xie discuss how artificial intelligence can shape the video game experience.

entry.title: 'There Are No Real Standards': Ready Player Me CEO Timmu Tõke on Building for an Open Gaming Ecosystem
entry.summary: Timmu Tõke, co-founder and CEO of Ready Player Me, joins Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin to discuss the startup's approach to powering avatars that are interoperable across games and metaverse platforms—and what's needed to convince the industry to adopt standards and open up.

entry.title: Blockchain Is 'Only Way' Forward for Gaming, Says Shrapnel Studio Head
entry.summary: Shrapnel Studio Head Don Norbury tells Kate Irwin the reasons why the upcoming first-person shooter game will offer a wide range of NFTs. He also reveals team-based gameplay plans and shares how game maps have already changed this year.

entry.title: Social Media Sentiment Is Key to Crypto Price Discovery
entry.summary: Sacha Ghebali, Director of Strategy and Business Development at The TIE, says social media sentiment remains a key factor in price movements for major cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum. However, he notes that sentiment has turned more negative lately amid regulatory uncertainty. Ghebali believes events like the Ripple lawsuit ruling significantly impacted sentiment and prices. André Beganski interviewed him at Messari Mainnet.

entry.title: 500Altcoins discusses DeFi Summer and the Dubai Crypto Scene - This Time Will Be Different - Episode 2
entry.summary: Our host Reza Jafery is joined by Gareth Fenney aka 500Altcoins. They discuss the glory days of DeFi Summer and whether or not its a smart move for builders in the crypto space to relocate to Dubai.
